ygData.subject: Velium Plate Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone been able to make this armor? I have looked around on the boards but only found information on how to convert the raw materials into boning, metal
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone been able to make this armor?

I have looked around on the boards but only found information on how
to convert the raw materials into boning, metal sheets, studs, etc.
Are there no recipes for actually crafting the armor (not implemented
yet)?

I also found it intriguing that you must buy the Coldain Velium
Temper rather than getting a Brewer to make it for you. All of the
others must be crafted. Hrm.


Many thanks,

Khazade Masterforge
Tallon Zek server
khazade@...
